citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The licensee has recently employed a new Attending Veterinarian (AV) because the previous AV has retired. The current
written Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) is part of the formal arrangements developed under the previous AV. The
licensee does not currently have a written PVC as part of the formal arrangements with the new AV. Lack of a written
PVC cannot ensure that adequate and appropriate veterinary care is being provided to the animals. The licensee must
develop and maintain a written PVC as part of the formal arrangements with the current AV. Correct by April 7, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The licensee has recently employed a new Attending Veterinarian (AV) because the previous AV has retired. The current 
written Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) is part of the formal arrangements developed under the previous AV. The 
licensee does not currently have a written PVC as part of the formal arrangements with the new AV. Lack of a written 
PVC cannot ensure that adequate and appropriate veterinary care is being provided to the animals. The licensee must 
develop and maintain a written PVC as part of the formal arrangements with the current AV. Correct by April 7, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
